full_text: Our patterns are available for free on our blog or purchase and download the ad-free PDF file here. www.foxandpinestitches.com Our bear ears hat knitting pattern is perfect for making handmade gifts for your loved ones, young and old. Sizes: 0-3 Months, 3-12 Months, 1-2 Years, 3-12 Years, Teen/Women, Men. Yarn: Any worsted medium weight (#4) yarn. The yarn used in the photos is Loops & Threads Impeccable Tweed. Check out our brand new stitch stoppers in our shop! www.foxandpinestitches.com Follow Fox & Pine Stitches Instagram: @foxandpinestitches Facebook: facebook.com/foxandpinestitches Ravelry: ravelry.com/designers/tara-marie-2 Pinterest: pinterest.com/foxandpinestitches Blog: foxandpinestitches.com Pattern and photos are the property of Fox & Pine Stitches.
